dimensions.label: Decision Making Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin make decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will analyze data and evidence to make informed, rational decisions.
Your FarTwin will trust their instincts and make decisions based on gut feelings or hunches.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin learn new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will learn best through visual aids, such as images or videos.
Your FarTwin will learn best through verbal communication, such as lectures or discussions.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin resolve conflicts?

options.description: Your FarTwin will assert themselves and try to 'win' arguments, even if it means hurting others' feelings.
Your FarTwin will listen to others, work together, and seek common ground to resolve conflicts peacefully.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach risk?

options.description: Your FarTwin will avoid risks and play it safe, even if it means missing out on opportunities.
Your FarTwin will take calculated risks and pursue new experiences, even if it means facing uncertainty.

dimensions.label: Creative Expression Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their creativity?

options.description: Your FarTwin will express themselves through writing, such as poetry or short stories.
Your FarTwin will express themselves through visual arts, such as painting or drawing.

dimensions.label: Technology Comfort Level
dimensions.description: How comfortable is your FarTwin with technology?

options.description: Your FarTwin is highly skilled and comfortable using technology, such as coding or hacking.
Your FarTwin has basic knowledge of technology, but may struggle with more complex tasks.

dimensions.label: Social Interactions Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin prefers to spend time alone or in small groups, and may feel drained by too much social interaction.
Your FarTwin is outgoing and enjoys being around people, often seeking social interactions and activities.

dimensions.label: Time Management Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin manage their time?

options.description: Your FarTwin is flexible and adaptable, adjusting to changing schedules and priorities as needed.
Your FarTwin prefers a structured schedule and may struggle with flexibility or spontaneity.
